ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] ROK city
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the help :) ... Woohoo, a quest!  I was being total newbie dork last night.  Hailing every thing I could find!  I guess I missed his store, I will
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the help :)
>
> * Yes * And talk to the guy banker - he talks about giving you something "a
> composer" left with him.

Woohoo, a quest! I was being total newbie dork last night. Hailing
every thing I could find! I guess I missed his store, I will keep
looking.

> * Not that I have found nor heard of. * Anyhow, travel is not that hard.
> And if you go back for songs - train then. Safefall you will want to have
> and prolly worth it to do some work to max it. Also, hide is one I
> neglected. Trouble is that you need to con something to know if it worked
> and its capped low so its not as good (not even close) to rogues. Might
> have been different if I knew how it worked and maxxed it early. Later on,
> you can buy your skills up as I probably will. Although that wastes
> training points - hmm oh well.

I was so excited to get my first teleport, I forgot to ask the druid to
wait a few minutes so I could run to HH and Quenos (I was in S Karana)
to buy the lvl 23 and 25 songs and put them in the bank.

Speaking of firsts, Sunday was my first teleport, my first rez (After
bragging about outrunning two avocets with 10hp left, I zone back in
only to pulse my heal song on my retreating cleric. Whack! Cleric
dead! Whack! Elfson dead!). My first trip to ROK, my first boat
problem ever! (amazing considering I have been playing since release,
when the boats used to crash all the time).

>
> * Heh * And I was thinking that the agro radius is pretty small or there is
> some delay. Stuff that should agro, I can run by fairly close. Stuff that
> does agro, I can out run pretty easily. I love my bard!

Really? Man those tall gnoll things (sarnaks?) agro me before I can see
them (I have to turn my clip plane to min since I am still having heavy
fog video card problems). Even the UD in Kithikor don't agro on me till
i can see them.

One more question: Does everyone get random faction hits in ROK? The
whole time I was there I was getting random faction hits. I assumed its
was a bard bug, but the rest of party was getting them too (not at the
same time, though)
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
